DOC.brief_summary: Objective : evaluate effectiveness Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) self-applied treatment pain impact therapy biomechanics , quality life sexuality woman deep endometriosis .
DOC.brief_title: TENS Self-applied Complementary Treatment Deep Endometriosis
DOC.detailed_description: - Women select participate study June 2016 June 2017 , medical record research routine query Endometriosis clinic Gynecology 's Hospital University Campinas ( UNICAMP ) clinic Gynecology ( Endometriosis routine query ) Hospital University São Paulo ( USP ) . All woman respond Check List inclusion study sign inform consent form . - The woman select randomized two distinct group : follow-up/treatment group ( FTG ) compose three phase 8 week treatment/monitoring group ( TFG ) consist two phase 8 week . The randomization seal brown envelope , whose numerical sequence generate computer program Statistical Analysis System ( SAS ) , hold person participate study . Once allocate , woman respond clinical socio-demographic questionnaire , Visual analog scale ; Deep Dyspareunia scale ; Diagram Location characterization Pain ; Endometriosis Health Profile ( EHP-30 ) ; Female Sexual Function Index pre-and post-treatment . In addition , woman fill daily control pain . After complete fill instrument hold postural evaluation image capture . The woman accompany 12 month regular contact review board . All procedure study carry researcher , enforce search protocol . After end collection , data enter Excel program Windows confer second digitizer . - The sample size calculation base pilot study develop Mira et al . ( 2015 ) whereas use TENS relief chronic pelvic pain deep dyspareunia generate endometriosis , whose pre-and post-treatment discomfort assess Visual analog scale ( EVA ) . The number woman study 22 woman divide two treatment group . Applied calculation sample size , test independent variable study cite give power test 90 % significance level 5 % , sample size obtain 24 patient total . Considering follow loss 20 % , total number shall 29 woman , divide two group : follow-up/treatment group ( n = 15 ) treatment/monitoring group ( n = 14 ) . For good quantification variable involve , seek ideally total 80 woman , divide two group ( n = 40 ) . - The data loss reason , consider analysis report . - The data obtain described mean ± standard deviation . The result test normal distribution use Shapiro-Wilk test . For analysis second sample group , feature use Fisher exact test . For comparison mean obtain scale questionnaire , pre-and post-intervention , t-test use non-parametric analog , variable , previously cite . The comparison variables group analyzed test nonparametric analog . Significance consider value p < .05 . The data analyze intention treat . The software use statistical analysis SAS version 9.2 .
DOC.criteria: Women reproductive age ; 18 50 year ; diagnosis deep endometriosis ( culdesac intestinal lesion ) ; use hormonal treatment least 3 month ; persistence chronic pelvic pain and/or dyspareunia . Women decrease skin sensitivity ; pregnant woman ; woman pacemaker implant ; cutaneous hypersensitivity ( allergic reaction gel electrode ) ; woman epilepsy ; cardiac ( cardiac arrhythmia ) ; osteosynthesis application place ; solution discontinuity skin ; malignant tumor ; acute inflammatory disease ; gynecological associated pathology ; cognitive deficiency precludes understanding instrument and/or instruction selfapplied TENS .
